subject: Baseball
Testosterone
Tests (Drug Use)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Bartolo Colon, enjoying a resurgent season, tested positive for testosterone and was banished for 50 games, a week after the Giants’ Melky Cabrera received the same penalty for the same substance.
snippet: Bartolo Colon, enjoying a resurgent season, tested positive for testosterone and was banished for 50 games, a week after the Giants’ Melky Cabrera received the same penalty for the same substance.
